title: The Godfather
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: Cabaret
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Music, Scoring Adaptation and Original Song Score
description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: Deliverance
description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, four outdoor men take a canoe trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

title: Sleuth
description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to his house, where two men engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: Solaris
description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
description: A surrealist film about a group of six friends who are continually interrupted in their attempts to have dinner together.

title: Cries and Whispers
description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
description: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

title: Jeremiah Johnson
description: A Mexican-American War veteran, Jeremiah Johnson, heads to the mountains to live in isolation. Woefully under-equipped for the task at hand, he is fortunate to find a mentor to introduce him to the necessary survival tactics.

title: The Getaway
description: A recently released ex-convict and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes terribly wrong.

title: What's Up, Doc?
description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and zany hijinks.

title: Last Tango in Paris
description: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

title: Play It Again, Sam
description: A neurotic film critic tries to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his imaginary idol, Humphrey Bogart.

title: Fat City
description: Two boxers at different stages of their careers—one a washed-up veteran and the other a promising up-and-comer—navigate their bleak lives in Stockton, California.

title: Sounder
description: The story of a family of black sharecroppers in Louisiana during the Great Depression, and their struggle to survive after the father is imprisoned for stealing food.

title: Lady Sings the Blues
description: The story of the legendary jazz singer Billie Holiday, tracing her rise to fame and her struggles with drug addiction.

title: The Candidate
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
description: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no chance of winning, so he is allowed to say exactly what he thinks.

title: Pink Flamingos
description: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Babs Johnson and her family compete against a rival couple in an attempt to prove that they are the "filthiest people alive."

title: Super Fly
description: A cocaine dealer wants to make one last big deal before retiring, but he finds it hard to escape the drug world.

title: Slaughterhouse-Five
description: A man named Billy Pilgrim tells the story of how he became unstuck in time and was abducted by aliens.

title: The Heartbreak Kid
description: A newlywed man falls in love with another woman while on his honeymoon.

title: The Cowboys
description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced schoolboys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time.

title: Frenzy
description: A serial killer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

title: The Ruling Class
description: A member of the House of Lords dies, leaving his estate to his son. Unfortunately, his son is insane: he thinks he is Jesus Christ.

title: Silent Running
description: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

title: Images
description: A pregnant children's book author finds her reality crumbling as she begins to see hallucinations at a remote country house.

title: The King of Marvin Gardens
description: A depressive late-night radio talk show host tries to help his charismatic brother with a get-rich-quick scheme in Atlantic City.

title: Butterflies Are Free
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A blind aspiring songwriter moves into his own apartment to gain independence from his over-protective mother and befriends his free-spirited neighbor.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

title: Travels with My Aunt
description: A stuffy bank clerk is swept into a whirlwind of international intrigue and romance by his eccentric aunt.

title: The Way of the Dragon
description: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

title: Roma
description: A sprawling, impressionistic portrait of Rome, shown through the eyes of a young man arriving in the city and through a series of contemporary vignettes.

title: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
description: A successful fashion designer falls in love with a young woman she meets, but their relationship becomes increasingly obsessive and destructive.

title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
description: In a future where apes have become slaves to humans, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, leads his fellow apes in a revolution.

title: Fritz the Cat
description: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of the 1960s.

title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex* (*But Were Afraid to Ask)
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: Seven segments related to the book of the same name, with Woody Allen adding his own unique twist on the subject of sex.

title: Junior Bonner
description: An aging rodeo rider returns to his hometown to compete in a rodeo and finds that his family and the town have changed.

title: Prime Cut
description: A Chicago mob enforcer is sent to Kansas City to settle a debt with a cattle rancher who uses his livestock for more than just beef.

title: The Hot Rock
description: A quartet of jewel thieves try to steal a valuable diamond from the Brooklyn Museum, but things don't go as planned.

title: Across 110th Street
description: Two New York City detectives race against the Mafia to find three amateur robbers who stole $300,000 from a mob-controlled policy bank in Harlem.

title: The Mechanic
description: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer, and eventually has to decide if his protégé is friend or foe.

title: Boxcar Bertha
description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on a corrupt railroad company.

title: State of Siege
description: In Uruguay, an official of the US Agency for International Development is kidnapped by a group of urban guerrillas.

title: Bad Company
description: A group of young men journey west to avoid the Civil War draft, but they soon turn to a life of crime.

title: Ulzana's Raid
description: A scout and a young lieutenant lead a cavalry troop to track down a raiding party of Apaches led by Ulzana.

title: Chloe in the Afternoon
description: Happily married Frederic fights the temptation of an affair with the free-spirited Chloe, who re-enters his life.

title: Avanti!
description: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his father's body, and discovers that his father died with his mistress of many years.

title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his own brand of justice.

title: Pete 'n' Tillie
description: A lonely bachelor and a spinster meet, fall in love, marry and have a child, but tragedy strikes.

title: Marjoe
description: Part documentary, part expose, this film follows one-time child evangelist Marjoe Gortner on the revivalist circuit.
